import React from 'react' import { Movie } from '../../interfaces/Movie' import AddCar from '/imagens/addCar.svg' interface CartProps { items: Movie[] onRemoveAll: () => void onFinalizePurchase: () => void onAddToCart: (movie: Movie) => void onRemoveFromCart: (movie: Movie) => void } const Cart: React.FC = ({ items, onRemoveAll, onFinalizePurchase, onAddToCart, onRemoveFromCart }) => { const totalPrice = items.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price * (item.quantity || 1), 0) if (items.length === 0) { return (

Seu carrinho est√° vazio.

) } return (
PRODUTO QTD SUBTOTAL
{items.map((item) => (

{item.title}

R$ {item.price.toFixed(2)}

{item.quantity || 1}

R$ {item.price}

))}

TOTAL R$ {totalPrice.toFixed(2)}

) } export default Cart
